projects.name: TWITCH STREAM VIEWER
projects.description: Built a web app to browse and watch live streams from Twitch.tv. Uses the Twitch.tv API, AngularJS, and Electron.

projects.name: NETFLIX SEARCH
projects.description: Built a web app to search Netflix for a specific show, actor, or director. Built using the Netflix Roulette API, React, and Axios

projects.name: PRACTICE KANA
projects.description: Web app to practice the japanese syllabic writing system known as kana. Built using AngularJS.

projects.name: COFFEE LOCATOR
projects.description: Developed a website that locates coffee shops in the user's location. Uses AngularJS.

projects.name: WALKERS COFFEE
projects.description: Redesign of a local coffee shop's website.
